txt.en: Defeat many Wood-trolls in the Wells of Langflood.
Defeat many Wood-trolls in the Wells of Langflood.

'Taurogrim? Wood-trolls? Whatever you call them, they fear the axe and they fear the fire, and that is enough for me. But I would not recommend using them for kindling. They burn with a vile, choking smoke, and it fills the lungs with poison.' - Runerik Knotbeard
Defeat many Wood-trolls in the Wells of Langflood
